Reviews.Title: Running the distance
Reviews.Author: trinetta
Reviews.Content: It has the distance that I needed to run from my house out to my shed on the inside to watch everything that go's on there.

Reviews.Title: exelent
Reviews.Author: mono
Reviews.Content: I recomended you just need to plug in and is all set no other ext. needed and for the price can beat.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: R. Holley
Reviews.Content: I like these cables. They work very well and I love the whole Revo setup. Much easier and faster to run that my neighbors camera system.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Alan Gomez
Reviews.Content: does what I need.. works good...I use on my REVO cams...I run this wire from my office to a pole and then to a tree were the cam is 75ft from my office and it does the job I need

ProductInfo.Features:
2-pack of 100-foot RJ12 Cable
Connect your camera to your DVR quickly and easily
One cable supplies power, data and video
RJ12 connectors for easy connection
ProductInfo.Name: Revo R100RJ12C-2 100-Feet RJ12 Cable (2-Pack)
